scripts.prisma:create: docker exec -it nextjs-web sh -c "npx prisma migrate dev --create-only"
scripts.prisma:migrate: docker exec -it nextjs-web sh -c "npx prisma migrate deploy"
scripts.prisma:migrate:dev: docker exec -it nextjs-web sh -c "npx prisma migrate dev"
scripts.prisma:sync: docker exec -it nextjs-web sh -c "npx prisma db push"
scripts.prisma:sync:reverse: docker exec -it nextjs-web sh -c "npx prisma db pull"
scripts.prisma:reset: docker exec -it nextjs-web sh -c "npx prisma migrate reset --force"
scripts.prisma:studio: docker exec -it nextjs-web sh -c "npx prisma studio --browser none --port 9090"
scripts.hasura:migrate: docker exec -it hasura-console sh -c "hasura migrate apply --database-name=default"
scripts.hasura:migrate:status: docker exec -it hasura-console sh -c "hasura migrate status"
scripts.hasura:migrate:reset: docker exec -it hasura-console sh -c "hasura migrate delete --all --database-name default"
scripts.hasura:metadata: docker exec -it hasura-console sh -c "hasura metadata apply"
scripts.hasura:metadata:reset: docker exec -it hasura-console sh -c "hasura metadata clear"
scripts.hasura:seed: docker exec -it hasura-console sh -c "hasura seeds apply --database-name=default"
scripts.hasura:seed:create: docker exec -it hasura-console sh -c "hasura seed create $npm_config_file --from-table $npm_config_table"
